node.address: Diagonal 35 No.8-29 - Av Escallon , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
We are a house with colonial style, a beautiful garden and 3 floors of tranquility and freshness. Start the day with our delicious breakfast and go for a walk and discover the city. All rooms have air conditioning. We have free WiFi, Co-working area, Bar, Pool, Shared Kitchen always clean, TV area and a terrace where you can take a perfect tan, We also have scheduled SPA service. Reception 24 Hrs. We have laundry service. We have luggage storage if you want to walk lightly after Check Out. Document printing service.

You will have free bedding and air conditioning, both in the bedrooms and in the private rooms. Put your belongings safe in the lockable lockers, so you sleep and leave quietly. If you fancy a treat, book a private double room or a large bedroom with its own bathroom. Women can choose to share mixed dorms with men or ask for female rooms.

Have a drink in our bar while watching TV in our comfortable rooms. If you are stressed from so many holidays just schedule a good massage. We have it! Do you want to cook? Our shared kitchen has Stove, Coffee maker, Sandwich, Refrigerator, Microwave, blender and all the utensils for you to have fun while you take a dip in the pool. Do you come to Cartagena and everyone will envy your tan? Just climb onto the terrace and become an enviable shrimp. And do not forget to use our laundry service to put on your favorite shirt again and again. We have Books where you can also mix your stay with some culture.

-Payment upon arrival by cash, credit cards, debit cards.
-No curfew
-Suitable for families with children.
-Taxes not included: 19% only for Colombians
-The bedrooms and the family room have breakfast at a cost of 10,000 COP.
-Check in from 14:00
-Check out before 12:00

description.description: We are only 10 minutes by taxi from the Rafael Núñez International Airport. Located in the historic center of the city, just 3 minutes walk from the public clock and walls. We are the perfect choice if you want to be close to Museums, Restaurants, Churches, Shops, Getsemani neighborhood, modern cafes and the commercial area of ​​the historic center where you can buy souvenirs, local crafts, food and drinks at local community prices. Our Team will guide you with our free map Easily.
